Pre-Game Insights: Argentina, the reigning World Cup and Copa America champion, will have a lot of expectations this summer to repeat as Lionel Messi remains in lead of the country.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Argentina has won its last four matches in a row, most recently defeating Ecuador 1-0 thanks to an Angel Di Maria goal in the 40th minute to secure the victory.
Guatemala, meanwhile, a minnow in the soccer world’s CONCACAF region, is likewise undefeated in its last four matches.
Others: This will be Argentina’s final friendly ahead of the high-stakes Copa America, which begins next Thursday, June 20, 2024.
